author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sasi Creative School of Business affiliated to Anna University is organising a job fair on Wednesday on its campus at Myleripalayam, Pollachi Road.

This is the sixth year of the fair that provides youngsters employment opportunities in the corporate world.

Twenty five companies will participate in the fair. HCL, Infosys, TVS, Manappuram Finance, Eureka Forbes, Mazenet, 365 Media, Mag Solvics, Solvers India, DeFrank Group, BharatBenz, Oscar Advertising, IDBI Federal, M Modal and ABT Maruti will be participating in the fair. Entry is free. Registrations will begin at 8.30 a.m. For details contact: V. Divya, assistant professor, at 95241-45525, V. Kanimozhi, assistant professor, at 98947-93391, Blessy Doe, assistant professor, at 96008-95538 or e-mail resume tosasijobfair@gmail.com
title: Job fair today
